scripts.install: echo '🚀 Installing Git Workspace MCP Extension dependencies...' && npm install
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building extension...' && npm run validate && echo '✅ Build complete!'
scripts.validate: echo '🔍 Validating manifest.json...' && node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('manifest.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✅ Manifest is valid JSON')"
scripts.dev: echo '🚀 Starting development server...' && node server/index.js
scripts.inspect: echo '🔍 Starting MCP Inspector...' && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node server/index.js
scripts.package: echo '📦 Creating DXT package...' && npm run build && zip -r git-workspace-v1.0.0.dxt manifest.json server/ node_modules/ package.json README.md LICENSE icon.svg
scripts.help: echo '📚 Available commands:' && echo '  npm run install  - Install dependencies' && echo '  npm run build    - Build extension' && echo '  npm run package  - Create .dxt file' && echo '  npm run inspect  - Debug with MCP inspector' && echo '  npm run dev      - Run development server'
